thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 5 of 95
thread.title: Jennifer Ferguson
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Jennifer Ferguson

author: Jennifer Ferguson
title: Jennifer Ferguson
text: Love Dior Lipstick. Bought Dior Addict 744 Party Red. Very nice feel and is a good color for redheads. Has orange in it. But I must say, my favorite is 659, solar red, which I bought 3 years ago. Apparently not available anymore! Too bad, because it truly is a great color for redheads that wear a lot of red, like me!
